text: Ranaldo Bailey (born 5 July 1996) is a footballer from Barbados who plays for Barbados Senior Men’s Team, he also played for BDFSP of the Barbados Premier League. He now represents University of South Carolina Aiken in the Peach Belt Conference in Div 2. ==Career== ===Northern Ireland=== Invited to the 2015 MLS Caribbean Combine,Ranaldo Bailey Selected for the MLS Caribbean Combine Barbados Football Association Bailey attracted the attention of Northern Ireland's Ballymena United, embarking on a trial there in April that year.Bailey up for Irish trial Nation News However, when Ballymena offered him a contract, the defender rejected it, explaining that pecuniary conditions there did not satisfy him.Bailey back from trial Barbados Today ==Personal life== He is the son of former footballer Horace Stoute.Caribbean Football Profile Caribbean Football Database == References == == External links == * at National-Football-Teams Category:Barbadian expatriate footballers Category:Sportspeople from Bridgetown Category:Barbados international footballers Category:Barbadian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:Pride of Gall Hill FC players Category:UWI Blackbirds FC players Category:Barbados Defence Force SC players
title: Ranaldo Bailey
